item.title: U.S. attacks Venezuela, captures Maduro and his wife; AG Bondi says charges include 'Narco-Terrorism'
item.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.

item.title: Trump's removal of Maduro prompts questions from Congress

item.title: Watch Trump's full comments following the U.S. strike against Venezuela
item.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled to speak Saturday morning following a stunning, large-scale attack on Venezuela overnight.

item.title: Trump: We are going to run Venezuela until we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition
item.description: President Donald Trump addressed the attack on Venezuela from his Mar-a-Lago residence in Palm Beach, Florida.
